docs.snippet: The N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament championship game between Villanova and North Carolina in Houston will be broadcast on TBS....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament championship game between Villanova and North Carolina in Houston will be broadcast on TBS.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that NCAA men’s basketball tournament championship game between Villanova and North Carolina in Houston will be broadcast for first time by cable television channel TBS.

headline.main: TBS Acquires N.C.A.A. Final and Fewer Eyeballs
headline.print_headline: For Its First Final, TBS Plays Down Ratings

docs.snippet: Ryan Arcidiacono, the Wildcats’ captain, motivates his teammates with passionate speeches, a contribution at least as important as his play on the court....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan Arcidiacono, the Wildcats’ captain, motivates his teammates with passionate speeches, a contribution at least as important as his play on the court.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column profiles Villanova captain Ryan Arcidiacono, who for past four years has been motivating and inspiring his teammates with passionate speeches; notes Arcidiacono is busy preparing with team for NCAA men's basketball tournament final against North Carolina.

headline.main: Ryan Arcidiacono May Talk Villanova to a Title
headline.print_headline: A Player Who May Talk Villanova to a Title

docs.snippet: Athletes in New Zealand have become more vigilant about the medication and supplements they take in the wake of Russian tennis player Maria Sharapova's positive test, Drug Free Sports New Zealand (DFSNZ) said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Athletes in New Zealand have become more vigilant about the medication and supplements they take in the wake of Russian tennis player Maria Sharapova's positive test, Drug Free Sports New Zealand (DFSNZ) said on Monday.

headline.main: Sharapova Positive Test Sparks Renewed Vigilance in NZ
headline.print_headline: Sharapova Positive Test Sparks Renewed Vigilance in NZ

docs.snippet: The work from Terezin is being staged in Madrid, and a Holocaust survivor, Dagmar Lieblova, said: “‘Brundibar’ can now be used to remember the past in a way that children can understand. It can also be a warning for the future.”...
docs.abstract: The work from Terezin is being staged in Madrid, and a Holocaust survivor, Dagmar Lieblova, said: “‘Brundibar’ can now be used to remember the past in a way that children can understand. It can also be a warning for the future.”

headline.main: Holocaust Survivor Recalls ‘Brundibar,’ a Children’s Opera

docs.lead_paragraph: When Brittney Sykes started playing AAU basketball, she didn't even know where Syracuse was.

headline.main: Syracuse Hoping for Big Payoff From Run to Championship Game

docs.snippet: The latest multi-million dollar development on the Las Vegas Strip features a leafy outdoor pedestrian area, 20,000 seat arena and small theater. It's a move to double-down on events and live entertainment that marks yet another significant pivot ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The latest multi-million dollar development on the Las Vegas Strip features a leafy outdoor pedestrian area, 20,000 seat arena and small theater. It's a move to double-down on events and live entertainment that marks yet another significant pivot away from gambling in Sin City.

headline.main: MGM Bets on Live Events With T-Mobile Arena, New Theater
headline.print_headline: MGM Bets on Live Events With T-Mobile Arena, New Theater

docs.snippet: The Golden State Warriors play so well after they lose, it makes one wonder why they don't do it more often....

docs.snippet: Villanova achieved an astounding 67-point swing as it traveled from a 23-point loss to Oklahoma in December to a record-setting 44-point victory over Oklahoma on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Villanova achieved an astounding 67-point swing as it traveled from a 23-point loss to Oklahoma in December to a record-setting 44-point victory over Oklahoma on Saturday.
docs.abstract: Marc Tracy On College Basketball column holds that Villanova men's basketball team, which is set to face North Carolina for national title, has improved drastically over course of season by using each loss as learning experience.

headline.main: In Five Months, Villanova Wildcats Have Matured Beyond Their Years
headline.print_headline: In Five Months, Wildcats Have Matured Beyond Their Years
